file.name: patch-test.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
paths:
    /ko-patch-generic-mediatype:
      patch:
        requestBody:
          required: true
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
    /ko-patch-mediatype-not-array:
      patch:
        requestBody:
          required: true
          content:
            application/json-patch+json:
              schema:
                type: string
    /ok-patch-mediatype-array:
      patch:
        requestBody:
          required: true
          content:
            application/json-patch+json:
              schema:
                type: array
    /ko-patch-without-body:
      patch:
        description: Patch without body
    /ko-patch-empty-body:
      patch:
        description: Patch empty body
        requestBody: {}

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /ko-patch-empty-body: patch: requestBody: content must have at least one entry
